mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL, NAME, AUTH, PHONE_NUM, REG_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND AUTH IN (10,19) AND DEL_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT EMAIL, NAME, PHONE_NUM, AUTH, TO_CHAR(reg_Date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as reg_date, TO_CHAR(LEV_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as LEV_DATE, DEL_FLAG FROM MEMBER m where AUTH IN (10,19)
AND EMAIL LIKE '%'||#{email}||'%'
ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
SELECT EMAIL FROM member where AUTH IN (10,19)

SELECT BOX_SEQ ,IN_USER, OUT_USER, (SELECT STORAGE_NAME FROM STORAGEBOX_LIST WHERE STORAGE_ID=sg.STORAGE_ID) AS STORAGE_ID , TO_CHAR(IN_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as IN_TIME , TO_CHAR(EX_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as EX_TIME , (SELECT cost FROM cost WHERE COST_CODE=sg.COST_CODE) as cost FROM STORAGE_GOODS sg WHERE OUT_USER =#{email} OR IN_USER =#{email}
